A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm really sad to say the movie is a disappointment.  A once great franchise\, has been swallowed up by a money making  machine(Disney).     The effect being a disjointed story that at times insults our intelligence\, old heroes being torn down and replaced by new heroes we don't care about it\, and a movie that pimps out characters for the purpose of being action figures (porgs\, Bad bb-8\, phasma\, etc.. )\n\nStar Wars is dead.
